item.description:
Booksigning with Robert Melillo of Brain Balance.

"Brain Balance Achievement Centers offer the Brain Balance Program ® in 34 nationwide locations. The Brain Balance Program® is an individualized and comprehensive approach to helping children with neurobehavioral and learning difficulties surmount their unique challenges. This proprietary, non-medical program has been successful in helping hundreds of children reach their physical, social/behavioral health and academic potential. We work with children who suffer with ADD/ADHD, Dyslexia, Tourette’s, Asperger’s and Autism Spectrum Disorders."

-brainbalancecenters.com

contact John with any further questions and IT'S FREE!!!:
john@fineartstone.com
item.why: Rates of ADD, ADHD, Autism, Dyslexia and the like are climbing in epidemic proportions - it is likely that you or someone you know is dealing with a diagnosis of this type with their immediate family. Dr. Melillo's work is cutting edge! Don't miss!!
item.name: Dr.Robert Melillo lectures on his cutting-edge ADD and Autism research
